title: Can't see ball on heartseeker orianna
body:
This was a consistent thing throughout entire game. Any time I had my ball on me, it would disappear. Only reason I knew I had my ball is because I'd have icon in status area and the arrow would be missing.

Can see here in screenshot: https://i.gyazo.com/e1ea30a2fef7b3a435825f27cbe29419.png

replies.body:
Hey Silktail - 

Is this occurring every game for you, or was this only occurring in one game?

>
> Hey Silktail - 
> 
> Is this occurring every game for you, or was this only occurring in one game?

Hello friend I logged on to let you know its also on regular orianna So I don't think it's a skin but cuz it happens on regular orianna. And it's not in all game only sometimes and for me it was only invisible when it was in me. I could Q it somewhere else and it would travel there but as long as it was over oriannas head it was invisible. Made it really confusing to play

Hey again! 

Thanks for the additional context here. We've seen the ball disappearing on Orianna randomly, but we're so far, been unable to track down a solid repro for the issue.

> Thanks for the additional context here. We've seen the ball disappearing on Orianna randomly, but we're so far, been unable to track down a solid repro for the issue.

What sneakeos said is true I put the ball on ally trundle in base in fountain  and I don't remember exactly but shortly after it was gone

I've noticed it only happens when I put the ball on someone else, and when it "returns" to me, the ball isn't there. I'm guessing it has something to do with what they do when they leave the range of her e.
This also happened to me one game. No clue what caused it. It was a few days ago now, and wasn't only on my screen.

> 
> Is this occurring every game for you, or was this only occurring in one game?

I don't play Orianna often enough to give you a good amount of data. I know that I played her again a day later and used Sewn Chaos and the bug did not occur.

Edit: Though I did notice that my ball would disappear if it was on someone and they died. But once I used an ability it would show up again.
